name: Teryaki Sukiyaki
description: This Teryaki Sukiyaki recipe is a healthified version of the classic, offering a delectable blend of savory flavors with a note of citrus from the lemon juice. Perfect for those looking for healthy recipes without sacrificing taste. Its high sodium and low sugar profile fits well into a balanced diet.

recipeInstructions.text: Season the Sukiyaki beef with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, heat the sesame oil over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the seasoned beef to the pan and cook until browned, about 3-4 minutes per side.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Squeeze the lemon juice evenly over the cooked beef.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle the teryaki sauce over the beef and cook for an additional 2 minutes to combine the flavors.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
